name: CyberAttribution
0:
”Alexa, run cyber attribution”
”Alexa, open cyber attribution”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cyber attribution
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill will provide you with a quick and funny cyber attack attribution. When your IT team is not sure from where the latest attack came from or you just want to roll a dice to have an answer for your CISO, when he asks which APT group attacked you. The answers are not meant to be taken seriously. This is to highlight the fact that attribution of cyber attacks is difficult.
As an example, simply say: Alexa, run cyber attribution
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
